overview: As the party’s 19th National Gifts Film, he actively responded to the call of “There is no comprehensive well-being without the health of the whole people”. With full of sincerity, he tells the story of the “White Angel” sowing love, Pan Feng (Bao Jianfeng), chief physician of the emergency department, The appearance is rigorous and unsmiling, but the heart is warm and there is a fiery "healer's benevolence." "As long as there is one percent of hope, we have to pay 100% of the effort." This is the longest words of the warmhearted doctor Pan Feng.
title: Doctor's Mind
